definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: retreat, flee, depart, stray, wander, flutter (NH id.; Ar. nad=a flee, run away; Aram. nad hate, abominate, shrink from, Aph. put to flight, etc.; [[נְדַד]] flee );—

retreat, flee Is 21:15 fr. before ([[מִפְּנֵי]]) swords; Is 33:3 at the sound ([[מִקּוֹל]]) of tumult; abs. Is 10:31, Is 22:3 Ps 68:13, Ps 68:13, of birds and beasts Je 4:25 Je 9:9 (+ [[הָלָָכוּ]]); pt.= fugitive Is 16:3, Is 21:14; of fleeing in horror, disgust, c. [[מִן]] pers. Na 3:7, Ps 31:12.
flee, depart, Isr. fr. ([[מִן]]) ´[[י]] Ho 7:13; of sleep ([[מֵעֵינַי]]) Ge 31:40 (E), abs. Es 6:1.

wander, stray (homeless, cf. [[נוד]]), [[עוֹף נוֹדֵד]] Is 16:2 (in sim.), so Pr 27:8 ([[מִן]] loc., in sim.), cf. v:Pr 27:8 ([[מִן]] loc.); of scattered Isr. Ho 9:17, Je 49:5; (searching) for food Job 15:23 (wicked man); [[אַרְתִיק נְדׂד]] Ps 55:8 I will wander afar.
trans. flutter wings (of bird, in fig.) Is 10:14.

definitions.title: Po‘ēl
definitions.body: Pf. consec. [[שֶׁמֶשׁ זׇֽרְחָה וְנׁêַדד]] Na 3:17 the sun hath arisen and it ( the locust swarm) fleeth away.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: chase away, Impf.  3 mpl. sf. [[וּמִתֵּבֵל יְנִדָֻּהוּ]] Job 18:18 (of wicked, ‖[[יֶהְדְּפֻהוּ מֵאוֹר]]).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: be chased away, Impf. 3 ms. [[וְיֻדַּד כְּחֶזְיוֹן]] Job 20:8 (of wicked); [[קוֹץ מֻנַׇד]] 2Sa 23:6 thorns thrust away (si vera l., cf. Dr.; Klo Bu HPS [[מִדְבָּר]] ´[[ק]]).
